flawed_nl_solution:
The first winner will receive 2400 / 3 = $<<2400/3=80>>80.
There will be 2400 - 80 = $<<2400-80=2320>>2320 left.
The other winners will receive 2320 / 10 = $<<2320/10=232>>232 each.
#### 232

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 800, not 80. It appears a zero was dropped from the number.
